content:
Hi ,
I am looking for information on How to go about setting up an accelerator project. what are the requirements and qualifying criteria. looking for some pointers.

There is also some information on the HL7 website: https://www.hl7.org/about/fhir-accelerator/
Accelerator programs are approved by the HL7 Board. If you want to set up a new one, I suggest you contact HL7 HeadQuarters

Thank you for your responses.
I have seen https://www.hl7.org/about/fhir-accelerator/ page. it is a good place to know about different accelerator projects running.
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FA/FHIR+Accelerator+Home has lot of information , I am going through pages. I will get back with questions if I don't find answers to my queries .
